<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

</MethodEndpoint>



Fetch a paginated list of roles with user and permission IDs.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
